eas_text: A CIVIL AUTHORITY HAS ISSUED A REQUIRED WEEKLY TEST FOR THE FOLLOWING COUNTIES/AREAS: Midway Islands, UM; AT 01:21 AM ON NOV 04, 2025 EFFECTIVE UNTIL 02:21 AM. MESSAGE FROM WSLF/CAP.
extra_text: The IPAWS Program Management Office is performing a TEST of the Emergency Alert System. No action is required. This is only a TEST.
